Uses of Interface
au.rmit.ract.planning.pathplanning.ai.heuristics.DistanceHeuristics

Packages that use DistanceHeuristics
au.rmit.ract.planning.pathplanning.ai   
au.rmit.ract.planning.pathplanning.ai.heuristics   
 

Uses of DistanceHeuristics in au.rmit.ract.planning.pathplanning.ai
 

Constructors in au.rmit.ract.planning.pathplanning.ai with parameters of type DistanceHeuristics
ALSSLRTAStarPlanner(DistanceHeuristics h, int lookahead)
          Creates a Local Search Space - Learning Real-Time A-Star Path Planner using the provided heuristic and the number of lookahead steps, having made no assumptions about the connectedness of the domain.
AStarPlanner(DistanceHeuristics h)
          Creates a classical A-Star Path Planner based on a heuristic
AStarPlanner(DistanceHeuristics h, float Weight)
          Creates an Weighted A-Star Path Planner based on a heuristic and a weight
LSSLRTAStarPlanner(DistanceHeuristics h, int lookahead)
          Creates a Local Search Space - Learning Real-Time A-Star Path Planner using the provided heuristic and the number of lookahead steps, having made no assumptions about the connectedness of the domain.
MovingSourceTargetDStarLitePlanner(DistanceHeuristics h)
          Creates a Moving Target D-Star Path Planner based on a default heuristic, Manhattan Distance heuristics, which assumes that the search domain is a two-dimensional grid world, having made no assumptions about the connectedness.
MovingTargetDStarLitePlanner(DistanceHeuristics h)
          Creates a Moving Target D-Star Path Planner based on a default heuristic, Manhattan Distance heuristics, which assumes that the search domain is a two-dimensional grid world, having made no assumptions about the connectedness.
 

Uses of DistanceHeuristics in au.rmit.ract.planning.pathplanning.ai.heuristics
 

Classes in au.rmit.ract.planning.pathplanning.ai.heuristics that implement DistanceHeuristics
 class DynamicHeuristics
           
 class EuclideanDistanceHeuristics
          An implementation of DistanceHeuristics based on Euclidean distance between any two points in a two dimensional space.
 class ManhattanDistanceHeuristics
          An implementation of DistanceHeuristics based on Manhattan distance between any two points in a two dimensional space.
